title: Trump calls his Covid diagnosis -- a disease that has killed 211,000 Americans -- a 'blessing from God'
US mail carrier charged over dumping election ballots in dumpsters
description: The Department of Justice has charged a mail carrier for dumping mail, including ballots, in two dumpsters in New Jersey.

title: Home investor finds thousands in cash hidden in home
description: A Chicago real estate investor found nearly $10,000 in cash hidden throughout a home he bought to renovate.

title: Efforts to protect against voter intimidation underway in the US
description: As Americans head to the polls for early voting, President Donald Trump continues to stoke fears about the security of the vote. CNN's Pamela Brown reports measures to combat voter intimidation are underway.

title: Tapper: Trump's messages on stimulus are dizzying
description: CNN's Jake Tapper and Julia Chatterley discuss the confusion around President Donald Trump's mixed messaging on approving a stimulus bill to provide relief for Americans amid the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Officer charged with fatally kneeling on George Floyd's neck posts $1 million bail
description: Derek Chauvin, the ex-Minneapolis police officer facing murder charges in George Floyd's death, has posted $1 million bail, his attorney, Eric Nelson, said Wednesday.

title: His TikTok went viral. So Ocean Spray gave him a truck
description: When Nathan Apodaca posted a video riding his longboard while drinking Ocean Spray juice to the Fleetwood Mac song "Dreams," he had no idea what would come next.

title: Boom rolls out XB-1 supersonic passenger airplane prototype
description: There's been very little good news to report in the aviation industry over the past few months, with airplanes grounded or pushed into early retirement.

title: Drone footage shows surfer's close encounter with shark
description: Matt Wilkinson was surfing at Sharpes Beach at Ballina when drone operators from Surf Life Saving NSW spotted a five-foot shark just behind him.

title: 'The Supermodels' will chart the rise of four of the most famous women in fashion
description: Naomi Campbell and Cindy Crawford were two of the biggest names in the modeling world in the '90s and they remain prominent figures today. Soon, fans will be able to re-live some of their most career-defining moments both on and off the runway.

title: As pandemic rages, hundreds of soccer players jet off thousands of miles round the world
description: As many countries grapple with a second wave of coronavirus cases, hundreds of footballers have flown thousands of miles around the world to play international matches.

title: How the 'parasite' QAnon conspiracy cult went global
CNN's Poppy Harlow to politicians: Do your job for the millions of Americans that don't have one
description: CNN's Poppy Harlow addresses politicians in Washington, DC, after President Donald Trump ordered his negotiators to halt talks over a new stimulus package while millions are hurting from the coronavirus crisis.

title: Nobel Prize in Chemistry awarded to two women for 'rewriting the code of life'
Crowds swarm the Great Wall of China as travel surges during holiday week
description: The scene at the Great Wall of China this past week would have been unthinkable just months ago.

title: A portrait of Queen Victoria's ex-slave goddaughter is going on display in historic mansion
description: A painting of an African ex-slave who became Queen Victoria's goddaughter has been unveiled at Osborne, the seaside home of the former British monarch.

title: Cruise ships torn apart after coronavirus sell off
description: On the beach, once-gleaming vessels lie dilapidated, their innards exposed, barely recognizable from their seafaring glory days.

title: US President chases his own political goals, with his White House in chaos and top generals in quarantine
description: A defiant President Donald Trump is chasing his own political goals while ignoring the human and economic toll of the pandemic, with his super spreader White House in chaos and top Pentagon generals in quarantine.

title: LeBron's stellar NBA Finals performance puts Lakers on verge of securing 17th championship
description: After a lethargic loss in Game 3, the Los Angeles Lakers showed their composure to bounce back and win the NBA Finals' fourth game, holding off the Miami Heat 102-96.

title: Germany reports highest number of new Covid cases since April
Hurricane Delta weakens to Category 3 storm ahead of expected landfall in Mexico
description: Hurricane Delta weakened to a Category 3 storm ahead of its expected landfall Wednesday on the Yucatan peninsula.

title: Trump is losing by 16 in a new CNN poll. And that's not the worst news.
description: With less than a month before the November election, President Donald Trump has hit a new low: He now trails former Vice President Joe Biden by his largest margin (16 points) of any CNN poll conducted in this entire election.

title: Eddie Van Halen dies at age 65 after long cancer battle
description: Eddie Van Halen, the renowned lead guitarist of iconic rock group Van Halen, has died, according to a social media post by his son. He was 65.

title: 'I Can See Clearly Now' singer Johnny Nash dies at 80
description: Johnny Nash, best known for his 1972 hit "I Can See Clearly Now," died Tuesday morning, his son, John Nash, told CNN. He was 80 years old.

title: Sydney's Bondi Beach considers privatizing
description: Australia's most iconic beach is considering a plan that may result in partial privatization.

title: 66% of companies still plan to give bonuses next year
description: The blunt trauma sustained by so many parts of the US economy due to the pandemic has hit many employers.

title: Pompeo keeps up anti-China campaign overseas as Washington plunged into Covid-19 chaos
description: All eyes may be on coronavirus test results in Washington, but Mike Pompeo is staying focused on China.

title: New York Times: Top Justice Department officials were 'driving force' behind migrant children separation
description: Top officials in the US Justice Department were the "driving force" behind President Donald Trump's controversial zero tolerance immigration policy that separated thousands of migrant children from their families, according to a draft of Justice Department Inspector General Michael Horowitz's investigation report reviewed by The New York Times.

title: Bitcoin's 12.3 million-digit code transformed into surreal paintings
description: Bitcoin may be completely paperless, but one artist has meticulously dragged it into the physical world by hand-painting the cryptocurrency's 12.3 million-digit founding code across 40 separate paintings.

title: China needs an economic revolution to deliver Xi's ambitious climate agenda
description: There's no solution to the climate crisis without China. President Xi Jinping just gave hope it might deliver one.

title: India tests missile that launches a torpedo hundreds of miles away
description: India says it has successfully tested a missile armed with a torpedo that could in theory strike enemy submarines more than 400 miles (643 kilometers) away.

title: Pence preps for debate as chances to shake up the race dwindle
Former CIA director accuses intel chief of selectively declassifying documents to help Trump
description: Former CIA director John Brennan on Tuesday accused current intelligence chief John Ratcliffe of selectively declassifying documents ahead of the November election that benefit President Donald Trump, telling CNN that the decision to release materials gathered by the agency on Russian allegations that Hillary Clinton was planning on "stirring up a scandal" against her Republican rival in 2016 was motivated by politics.

title: Nicole Kidman offers rare comment on Tom Cruise marriage
description: Nicole Kidman doesn't want you reading too much into her monologue about infidelity in the 1999 film "Eyes Wide Shut."

title: Mexico is one of the places Americans could go on vacation. Now some are scrambling to escape a hurricane
description: Instead of celebrating her milestone birthday with friends in a posh Airbnb in Cancun, Mexico, one American woman is hunkering down in a hurricane shelter.

title: Joe Biden's Gettysburg address is the best of his campaign
description: Four weeks from Election Day, with a 16-point lead in the polls, Joe Biden decided it was time to give a Big Speech -- and he chose the biggest historical arena possible.

title: An angry elk gored a Colorado man who was playing golf
description: A day catching up with friends and soaking in the scenery on a beautiful mountain golf course in Colorado this weekend ended with a golfer's kidney sliced in half by an angry elk.

title: Biden: Next debate should not be held if Trump still has Covid-19
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden said Tuesday that the second presidential debate should not be held if President Donald Trump is still infected with coronavirus, but that he would base his participation in the debate upon recommendations from medical experts.

title: Singapore will pay citizens to have a baby during the pandemic
description: Singapore will offer a one-time payment to aspiring parents during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Top White House aide Stephen Miller tests positive
description: Stephen Miller, a top policy adviser to President Donald Trump, has tested positive for coronavirus, he confirmed in a statement Tuesday.

title: Ex-pandemic preparedness chief resigns from federal government
description: The ousted director of the office involved in developing a coronavirus vaccine has now resigned from his post at the National Institutes of Health, charging that the Trump administration "ignores scientific expertise, overrules public health guidance and disrespects career scientists."

title: Pence team agrees to allow plexiglass barrier at VP debate
description: Live updates | Special coverage | Tracking US Covid-19 cases

title: Kamala Harris faces unique challenges in the VP debate
description: With few exceptions, vice presidential debates are like opening acts at a concert. They're entertaining enough but not what you come to see.

title: White House official shares how staff is interacting with Trump
description: White House deputy press secretary Brian Morgenstern explains how the White House is running amid a coronavirus outbreak among many top Trump administration officials. The White House has declined offers from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to help with contact tracing.

title: Jane Fonda puts on the spandex for hilarious 80's parody
description: Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom joined Jane Fonda for an 80s-themed exercise class to remind people to register to vote.
